title: Happy Birthday, Emma!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Happy birthday, Emma-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Thank you, Nozomi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>To celebrate, I’ll give you a reading of your future, okay, Emma-chan. Your future will be.... Wow, this card is the best one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Does that mean it’ll be really good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah. If I have to put it into words, it’s like getting a huge rainbow flower circle mark in life. It means that the gods are properly watching your hard work, Emma-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m so happy! It must be because I visited the shrine you’re helping at on new year, right, Nozomi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, that’s right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>....Ah, I just got a message from Kasumi-chan. It says, “We’re waiting for you with a bunch of rainbow bread rolls prepared”! Waaah, amazing! This must be the huge rainbow flower circle mark you were talking about!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, then let’s hurry up and get to the others<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah! I can’t wait for the feasts♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
